description:
Sota Mizushino was watching the anime "Elemental Symphony of Vogelchevalier" in his room when suddenly, Selesia Upitiria, a character from the anime, and a mysterious girl dressed in a military uniform appear in his room. Sota gets caught in the middle of their battle and follows them to Yoyogi Park, where Meteora Ã-sterreich, a character from the game "AVALKEN of Reminisce", suddenly appears.
Source: amazon

titles.title: "I Will Remember Everything That Happened to Me."
"Je me souviendrai de tout ce qu`il m`est arrivé."
Subarashiki Koukai "I Will Remember Everything That Happened to Me."
素晴らしき航海 "I will remember everything that happened to me."
멋진 항해 "I Will Remember Everything That Happened to Me."
